channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Android

item.title: CVE-2022-22784|2024-09-16T17:59:18.129Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20client%20for%20meetings%20for%20android
item.description: The Zoom Client for Meetings (for Android, iOS, Linux, MacOS, and Windows) before version 5.10.0 failed to properly parse XML stanzas in XMPP messages. This can allow a malicious user to break out of the current XMPP message context and create a new message context to have the receiving users client perform a variety of actions.This issue could be used in a more sophisticated attack to forge XMPP messages from the server.
